The claim alleges that Jeanne Ives: campaign for governor is being funded by Mike Madigan's corrupt insider machine, specifically through shady labor union cash. The authenticity of this aspect was verified by examining the political donations received by Ives from the International Union of Operating Engineers Local 150 PAC, which is described as a "Madigan-aligned labor group."
The expert: s verdict includes information about the political donations made by the International Union of Operating Engineers Local 150 PAC, which has given money to both Democrats and Republicans who support road building and construction projects. This aspect was employed to show that the PAC's donations to Ives were not exclusive to her and that other Republican lawmakers also received money from the same labor group.
